column5: This one goes out to Mother Nature!  This year the most important thing iv learn is .  Be one with mother Nature and she will payback Generously.  After (Whitespinnerbait) BAILS out on me.  my good Ol' pal Mike phones me up.  RING A DING DING!!!   @ the lake at 9 am!  Start the day of at a steep drop of .  NOTHING!!!!  And there i am shooting my mouth @elling him we are getting minimum 30 + bass 4 lbs range today.!  i knew in the back of my head it was going to be a slow day ....  KEEP HOPE ALIVE!  I land the first!    SLOW,COLD ans LIGHT....  temp +2 Co winds 20 km/h  It was a hard day let me tell you!    They were still taking the YUM tho!    Some @ 30 FOW others at 15 FOW .. all deep tho.  We get in a remote bay were the wind is calm . ( THANK MOTHER NAT.)  and mike lands his first!    A sweet 3 lbs bass and he lets her go .    put the bait at the same place.  One smallie two smallie.      We finaly get to the '' nickel point'' high winds make it hard to fish .  but we get around it and i land this smooth Bonze back around the corner of the point!      We drift along the shore line and in The deep @ 30 Fow a Beauty hits me!    Mike was going to fall asleep after 45- 60 Mins. of SLow action.  we get to a '' rocky hump'' and he gets into a small frenzy.  he lands two back to back Foot balls.!    The release!    After these, the bite DIED down to nothing.  1:30 later Nothing to prove and we are OUT A HERE!   10 bass were caught today.  Froze our fingers off.  nice sunny day.  HIGH winds  Great day to end the Smalll mouth hunt!  PS: bassman187   No food was rigugitated in this outting. happy???
good on ya for getting out and getting some nice fish too!
what the hell......   Man I was only joking when I said someone else could take my spot....   Some fishing partner you are
With smallies like that on the line there is no joking around, someone will always go if asked, Sweet day you guys had, my turn tomorrow I hope, last chance for me. I love Lake XXXXX's Richard
dont hate the fisherman hate the SKILLZ!
All I can say after seeing a few of these posts, you guys are sitting on a SMB gold mine!  Nice work with the YUM baits too.  Awesome!
All hail to the SMB MASTER   :worthy:    :thumbsup_anim: Great job you guys!!!  Nice bronzebacks   :clapping: Thanks for sharing Kevin..... now bring on hard water Jacques
wow, i'll be your partner next Kev, i even bought my quebec license this year, i can be there in about 5 hours!   good day for sure congrats on a few more beauties.
someone    sounds jealous
i think its time to buy some crawbugs  -Ben

Nice report!!   Hey Kevin.....you gotta remember that Whitespinnerbait isn't a spring chicken anymore   .......the cold sets into his old bones a lot quicker now   ....having said that, I'm outa here for what may be my last Muskie Hunt on the river....the cold forecasted -7C nights this week may force me to pull the pontoon boat for the season   I was hoping to make it right through until Dec. 15th this year but mother nature may have other plans!!!!

anyone driving 5 houres to fish with me deserve a place in my boat!   its as simple as a PM and a plan that works.   and we are on the lake catching these brutes.   Now with all these brutes and spending multiple houres trolling for musky my wrist is broken!  but how can i complain!
sweet report kevin heading out for browns today ...last outing of the year for soft water
That or tubes they replicate the same thing... crayfish.There  # 1 food source!     Good luck Buddy!   make sure to report the outting.   id love to see some shots of them brown trouts!
Incredible report once again, wow!
YUM YUM YUM YUM   Great report dude.

Great report Kevin, I always enjoy reading them!!  Looks like a great end to a great bass season!  Just read your Nov 25th report as well...holly $#@& you got some sweet bassin lakes there in QC!  Jon
Bass till the bitter end !!! Love the report. Thanks for sharing
some great shots!! love the hold where half the fish is in the water. Nice fish! thanks for sharing.
Nicely done!!  Looks like a great way to cap off your bass season.  Great report, thanks for putting it up.  What about the muskies?  Any love?
wow nice haul!!!  Cheers!

Not quite the love making between mss. musky and I  She found out a way to avoid 40 houres of tease with everything i had to give her.  she dumped me after hooking into a big branche that gave me hope.  she broke my heart...... until next year that is... or maybe.... a BIG maybe ..... this week-end!
